title: Kareshi wo Ron de Kaimashita
overview:
Ukishima Tae works at the reception and wants to get married and become a housewife as soon as possible. She's Dating a work colleague Shiraishi Sunbeam and pretends to be sweet and innocent, but actually Tae is quite a sharp tongue and likes to speak openly.
One day, to relieve stress, she decides to buy a guy named Setsuna June, who has to agree because of their debts.
